name: cavalier
author: mudi <mudi@renegare.com>
description: Exposes your your favorite selenium webdriver through a "page object"-esque interface.

scripts.test: rm -rf coverage && nyc --reporter=html ava test/**/*.spec.js test/lib/**/*.spec.js && nyc report
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --template readme_tmpl.hbs lib/*.js > README.md && echo "\n---\nGenerated: `date`" >> README.md
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run lint && npm run docs && git commit -am 'update docs'
